query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Training material on the Reflexive Policy Agenda
result.description: The deliverable will serve as the training material for the trainings in 3 nonimplementer cities Belfast Chemnitz Pcs on developing Reflexive Policy Agendas at the local level

result.title: Framework study on socio-economic inequalities in Europe
result.description: Based on Tasks 1.1-1.3, the study provides a complex picture on inequality in Europe and serves as a reference point for the other work packages. It links the scale and dimensions of inequality with the main drivers on member state and regional level.

result.title: Machinery-specific safety & risk assessment on Refurbishment and Re-use parts
result.description: Contains the techniques employed for assessing safety & risks related to refurbished & re-used parts in the industrial environments foreseen in RECLAIM. First version (M24) will include only the assessment techniques that will be used.
